name: MoPub-TapJoy-Adapters
summary: TapJoy Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Interstitial, Rewarded Video.

To download and integrate the TapJoy SDK, please check this tutorial: https://dev.tapjoy.com/sdk-integration/ios/getting-started-guide-publishers-ios/ 


For inquiries and support, please email https://dev.tapjoy.com/contact-support/.
